coding_assistant.name: AI Coding Assistants
coding_assistant.description: AI-powered tools for code completion, generation, and development workflow

ai_agent_framework.name: AI Agent Frameworks
ai_agent_framework.description: Frameworks for building autonomous AI agents and multi-agent systems

video_ai.name: AI Video Generation
video_ai.description: AI tools for generating, editing, and transforming video content

llm_provider.name: LLM Providers
llm_provider.description: Companies providing large language model APIs and services

ai_music.name: AI Music Generation
ai_music.description: AI tools for creating music and audio content

ai_writing.name: AI Writing Tools
ai_writing.description: AI-powered tools for content creation, copywriting, and text generation

ai_image.name: AI Image Generation
ai_image.description: AI tools for creating, editing, and enhancing images

ai_productivity.name: AI Productivity Tools
ai_productivity.description: AI-powered tools for meetings, notes, and workflow automation

ai_development.name: AI Development Platforms
ai_development.description: AI-powered platforms for building web apps and prototypes

ai_business.name: AI Business Tools
ai_business.description: Enterprise AI tools for sales, marketing, and customer service

cursor.name: Cursor
key_features: AI-first IDE built on VS Code fork
cursor.unique_selling_point: The only AI IDE with true multi-file editing and agent capabilities
cursor.best_for: Developers who want an AI-native IDE experience with deep codebase understanding

github_copilot.name: GitHub Copilot
key_features: Works in any IDE (VS Code, JetBrains, Neovim)
github_copilot.unique_selling_point: Industry standard with seamless GitHub ecosystem integration
github_copilot.best_for: Teams already using GitHub who want reliable code completion

windsurf.name: Windsurf
windsurf.unique_selling_point: Most generous free tier among AI coding assistants
windsurf.best_for: Developers who want powerful AI features without paying

trae.name: Trae
key_features: Builder mode for full project generation
trae.unique_selling_point: Access to premium Claude models for free
trae.best_for: Developers who want Cursor-like features without the cost

tabnine.name: Tabnine
tabnine.unique_selling_point: Best choice for enterprises with strict privacy requirements
tabnine.best_for: Enterprise teams that cannot send code to external servers
limitations: Training on own code requires setup

claude_code.name: Claude Code
claude_code.unique_selling_point: Most powerful terminal-native AI coding assistant with agentic capabilities
claude_code.best_for: Power users who prefer terminal workflows and need deep codebase reasoning

langchain.name: LangChain
langchain.unique_selling_point: Industry standard framework with the largest community
langchain.best_for: Enterprise teams building complex RAG and agent systems

crewai.name: CrewAI
crewai.best_for: Teams who want to model human workflows with AI agents

sora.name: Sora
sora.unique_selling_point: Most realistic AI video generation, directly from OpenAI
sora.best_for: Content creators who need high-quality, realistic video clips

kling.name: Kling AI
kling.unique_selling_point: Best value for AI video generation with competitive quality
kling.best_for: Creators who need frequent video generation at lower cost

heygen.name: HeyGen
heygen.unique_selling_point: Best for creating talking-head videos without filming
heygen.best_for: Marketers and educators who need scalable video content

runway.name: Runway
runway.unique_selling_point: Professional video editing suite with AI generation
runway.best_for: Video editors who want AI tools integrated into their workflow

synthesia.name: Synthesia
synthesia.unique_selling_point: Most professional AI avatar platform for corporate training and communications
synthesia.best_for: L&D teams and enterprises creating training videos at scale

suno.name: Suno
suno.unique_selling_point: Most capable AI for generating complete songs with vocals
suno.best_for: Content creators who need royalty-free music

udio.name: Udio
udio.unique_selling_point: Best for diverse music genres with superior vocal quality
udio.best_for: Musicians and creators exploring AI-generated music across genres

grok.name: Grok
grok.unique_selling_point: Only AI with real-time social media data from X
grok.best_for: Users who want current events and less filtered responses
limitations: Web access limited to X data

claude.name: Claude
claude.unique_selling_point: Best-in-class for coding and long-form analysis
claude.best_for: Developers and analysts who need deep, nuanced reasoning

chatgpt.name: ChatGPT
chatgpt.unique_selling_point: Most versatile AI assistant with largest feature set
chatgpt.best_for: General users who want an all-in-one AI assistant
limitations: Can be slower than Claude for coding

gemini.name: Gemini
gemini.unique_selling_point: Best integration with Google ecosystem and longest context
gemini.best_for: Google Workspace users who need AI across Gmail, Docs, and Drive
limitations: Less capable than GPT-4 on some tasks

claude_opus_4_6.name: Claude 4.6 Opus
claude_opus_4_6.unique_selling_point: The highest-reasoning model available for complex, multi-step agentic tasks.
claude_opus_4_6.best_for: Enterprise architects and developers building autonomous agent swarms.

openai_o3.name: OpenAI o3
openai_o3.unique_selling_point: The first 'reasoning engine' designed purely for scientific and mathematical breakthroughs.
openai_o3.best_for: Researchers, quants, and systems engineers needing absolute precision.

jasper.name: Jasper AI
jasper.unique_selling_point: Most comprehensive AI writing platform with brand voice training
jasper.best_for: Marketing teams needing on-brand content at scale

copyai.name: Copy.ai
copyai.unique_selling_point: Best for automating entire content workflows, not just individual pieces
copyai.best_for: Solo marketers automating repetitive content tasks

writesonic.name: Writesonic
writesonic.unique_selling_point: Cheapest GPT-4 powered writing tool with real-time web data
writesonic.best_for: Budget-conscious content creators who need web-connected AI

grammarly_ai.name: Grammarly AI
grammarly_ai.unique_selling_point: Only AI writing tool that works natively across every application
grammarly_ai.best_for: Professionals who need polished writing in emails, docs, and messages
limitations: AI generation less capable than Jasper

midjourney.name: Midjourney
midjourney.unique_selling_point: Highest aesthetic quality in AI image generation
midjourney.best_for: Artists and designers who need photorealistic or stylized imagery

dalle3.name: DALL-E 3
dalle3.unique_selling_point: Best text rendering in images and tightest ChatGPT integration
dalle3.best_for: Users who want image generation integrated into their ChatGPT workflow

stable_diffusion.name: Stable Diffusion
stable_diffusion.unique_selling_point: Only fully open-source image generation with unlimited local use
stable_diffusion.best_for: Developers and artists who want full control and customization

leonardo_ai.name: Leonardo AI
leonardo_ai.unique_selling_point: Best for game art and design assets with intuitive web interface
leonardo_ai.best_for: Game developers and designers needing consistent asset generation

notion_ai.name: Notion AI
notion_ai.unique_selling_point: AI deeply integrated into the most popular all-in-one workspace
notion_ai.best_for: Teams already using Notion who want AI-enhanced productivity

otter_ai.name: Otter.ai
otter_ai.unique_selling_point: Best-in-class meeting transcription with automatic action items
otter_ai.best_for: Teams with heavy meeting schedules who need automated notes

fireflies_ai.name: Fireflies.ai
fireflies_ai.unique_selling_point: Most powerful meeting search and analytics across all your conversations
fireflies_ai.best_for: Sales teams who need searchable meeting intelligence

perplexity.name: Perplexity
perplexity.unique_selling_point: The Google killer - search with direct AI answers and real citations
perplexity.best_for: Researchers and professionals who need accurate, cited answers fast

you_com.name: You.com
you_com.unique_selling_point: Multi-modal AI search that combines chat, code, and image generation
you_com.best_for: Power users who want search, chat, and creation in one interface

phind.name: Phind
phind.unique_selling_point: AI search engine built specifically for developers
phind.best_for: Developers who need technical answers with code examples

replit_ai.name: Replit AI
replit_ai.unique_selling_point: Only platform where you can build, deploy, and host apps entirely in the browser with AI
replit_ai.best_for: Beginners and rapid prototypers who want zero-setup development

v0_dev.name: v0 by Vercel
v0_dev.unique_selling_point: Fastest path from idea to production-ready React UI
v0_dev.best_for: Frontend developers who want to rapidly prototype UIs with proper component architecture

bolt_new.name: bolt.new
bolt_new.unique_selling_point: Generate and run full-stack applications entirely in the browser
bolt_new.best_for: Developers who want to quickly prototype full-stack apps without local setup

lovable.name: Lovable
key_features: AI app builder from natural language
lovable.unique_selling_point: Most intuitive AI app builder with conversation-driven development
lovable.best_for: Non-technical founders and designers who want to build web apps

devin.name: Devin
devin.unique_selling_point: First fully autonomous AI software engineer that completes tasks independently
devin.best_for: Engineering teams wanting to delegate entire development tasks to AI

salesforce_einstein.name: Salesforce Einstein
salesforce_einstein.unique_selling_point: Most deeply integrated AI for enterprise CRM with predictive analytics
salesforce_einstein.best_for: Enterprise sales teams already on Salesforce who want AI-driven insights

hubspot_ai.name: HubSpot AI
hubspot_ai.unique_selling_point: Best AI-powered marketing and CRM platform for SMBs
hubspot_ai.best_for: Growing businesses that need all-in-one marketing, sales, and service with AI
limitations: AI features limited on lower tiers

zendesk_ai.name: Zendesk AI
zendesk_ai.unique_selling_point: Industry-leading AI for customer support automation
zendesk_ai.best_for: Customer support teams wanting to reduce ticket volume with AI
